pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:1.3.1: According to Sp.2.604 this means the bean curries should make up one quarter of the food: _Samasūpako nāma yattha bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo sūpo hoti_.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:1.5: The punctuation of the Mahāsaṅgīti edition has been corrected here so as to agree with _sekhiya_ 34, [Bu Sk 34:1.6](pli-tv-bu-vb-sk34:1.6). The text mistakenly had _hatthahāriyo_ in the next sentence.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk29:1.13: According to the Kaṅkhāvitaraṇī commentary this means any curries apart from bean curry: _ṭhapetvā pana sūpaṁ avasesā sabbā pi sūpeyyabyañjanavikati rasaraso nāma hoti_. My translation, however, is based on the fact that all other foods too are excluded.
